channel.title: Question
channel.description: when i want to add a code to something like a wc script where would i put it in mopar client

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @SRL_benjaa SRL benjaa
item.description:
@SRL_benjaa wrote:

it depends what you want it to do

a rule of thumb, is you have to declare something before using it, so procedures must be placed above the code calling it

eg;

procedure CutTree;
begin
DoSomeOfTheseOnes;
end;

procedure MainLoop;
begin
repeat
Antiban;
CutTree;
DropLogs;
until(LoggedOut);
end;

I hope that helps alittle, i couldnt really understand the question though

Read full topic
